name: Chuao Baconluxious Milk Chocolate Bar
description: It has been said that bacon makes everything better, chuao prove that adage with their Maple Bacon bar. Smooth 41% cacao milk chocolate, a splash of maple syrup, and a hint of smoked sea salt over crispy uncured bacon bites. It's one seriously amazing chocolate bar.Ingredients: Premium milk chocolate (41% cacao, cacao butter, sugar, dehydrated milk, sunflower & soy lecithin [as and emulsifier], natural vanilla), maple sugar, uncured bacon (pork, water, salt, turbinado sugar, seasoning), bonfire smoked sea salt, natural maple flavour (maple, canola oil).
